title: Ghost blas provider reported by spack
body:
I amusing spack on a POWER9 machine and I want to use IBM's ESSL as a provider of blas.  I have the following package.yaml file:
```
--> cat ~/.spack/linux/packages.yaml
packages:
  spectrum-mpi:
    paths: 
        spectrum-mpi@10.02.00 arch=linux-rhel7-ppc64le: /opt/ibm/spectrum_mpi
    version: [10.02.00]
    buildable: false
  essl:
    paths:
        essl@6.1%xl_r arch=linux-rhel7-ppc64le: /opt/ibmmath/essl/6.1
    version: [6.1]
    buildable: false
  all:
    providers:
      mpi: [spectrum-mpi]
      blas: [essl]
```
I installed essl as follows:
```
--> spack install essl
==> essl@6.1 : externally installed in /opt/ibmmath/essl/6.1
==> essl@6.1 : generating module file
==> essl@6.1 : registering into DB
```
and now I have the following packages installed:
```
--> spack find
==> 9 installed packages.
-- linux-rhel7-ppc64le / gcc@4.8.5 ------------------------------
cmake@3.11.1  ncurses@6.0  openssl@1.0.2n  pkgconf@1.4.0  spectrum-mpi@10.02.00  zlib@1.2.11

-- linux-rhel7-ppc64le / xl_r@16.1 ------------------------------
essl@6.1  spectrum-mpi@10.02.00  zlib@1.2.11
```

When I try to spec petsc I see the following error:
```
--> spack spec petsc%xl_r^essl
Input spec
--------------------------------
petsc%xl_r
    ^essl

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: Multiple providers found for 'blas': ['essl@6.1%xl_r@16.1 fflags="-qzerosize" ~cuda~ilp64 threads=openmp arch=linux-rhel7-ppc64le', 'veclibfort@0.4.2%xl_r@16.1 fflags="-qzerosize" +shared arch=linux-rhel7-ppc64le']
```
From the previous list of installed packages, one can see that I don't have veclibfort installed.  Consequently, that package should not be listed as a provider of blas.

I cannot get around this problem even if I specify essl by its hash:
```
--> spack find -l essl
==> 1 installed packages.
-- linux-rhel7-ppc64le / xl_r@16.1 ------------------------------
7tl5cbg essl@6.1
--> spack spec petsc%xl_r^/7tl5cbg
Input spec
--------------------------------
petsc%xl_r
    ^essl@6.1%xl_r@16.1 fflags="-qzerosize" ~cuda~ilp64 threads=openmp arch=linux-rhel7-ppc64le 

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: Multiple providers found for 'blas': ['essl@6.1%xl_r@16.1 fflags="-qzerosize" ~cuda~ilp64 threads=openmp arch=linux-rhel7-ppc64le', 'veclibfort@0.4.2%xl_r@16.1 fflags="-qzerosize" +shared arch=linux-rhel7-ppc64le']
```
